title: april 19: welcome to springfield [hosted by: Tessa Violet] (with Lolo Zouaï)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Tessa Violet celebrates the debut of The Simpsons. Then, Lolo Zouaï stops by the show. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
